### Datatable table example

```{r, echo=FALSE, eval =TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library("knitr")
library("rmarkdown")
library("tidyverse")
library("DT")
gene_pair <- read_tsv("data/literature_support.tsv")
gene_pair <- gene_pair[, colSums(!is.na(gene_pair)) > 0]

gene_pair |> DT::datatable(rownames = FALSE, 
                           filter = "top",
                           extensions = 'Buttons', 
                           options = list(
                             dom = 'Bfrtip',
                             buttons = list(
                               'copy', 
                               'print', 
                               list(
                                 extend = 'collection',
                                 buttons = c('csv', 'excel', 'pdf'),
                                 text = 'Download'
                               )
                             ),
                             lengthMenu = list(c(10, 25, 50, -1), c('10', '25', '50', 'All')),  # Set the length menu
                             pageLength = 25  # Default rows per page
                           )
) |>
  DT::formatStyle(columns = colnames(gene_pair), 
                  fontSize = '95%', color = 'navy')
```
